item.title: Burger Shack
item.description: A simple burger shop game. Idea by TacoShack Economy Discord Bot. Where you make / sell burgers and sell them. By time, you’ll have automation and create restaurant chain like McDonalds.

item.title: Countries that I would like to move to
item.description: The Netherlands Bike Education Non car-centric Japan Anime Non car-centric New Zealand 90% of electricity produced are renewable Beautiful country France Nuclear power French sounds nice Germany German sounds cool Beatiful cities Good food Kinda car-centric, but not much.

item.title: I am alive
item.description: Create a I am alive button that you can click every now and then and share to other to let them know that you’re alive and well.

item.title: I don't regret anything and you shouldn't too
item.description: Have you ever wished to go back in time to fix something I’m sure most people probably had at some point in their life.

item.title: I don't regret anything and you shouldn't too
item.description: Urban design Design cities that is built for cars Walkable cities Rapid transit Trains Nuclear power We transitionning ourselves fast enough Used in places where geography is a problem Short term solution for renewable energy in the future Meat ( quite hard) Cows Plant based ( eh )

item.description: A study-like website to watch trains. Maybe explain how I love it and how good it is.

item.title: Language Documentation
item.description: A documentation for languages written in English. It will teach about that language in the same format. Documentation will be written like a library documentation.

item.title: New Year map
item.description: A world map that shows which countries is having a new year real time. Like sweeping the world with a new year.

item.description: Display the time schedule of my day as a wheel. Maybe create this as a template for others to create.

item.title: Tell the Duck
item.description: A theraphy website. Idea by Rubber duck debugging - Wikipedia but instead of fixing your bugs, it’ll hopefully help with your sadness, stress, anxiety or whatever.

item.title: The Space
item.description: A cozy website with a fireplace and a clock. Kinda like a studying website but for people who are sad. Built from Pat’s desired ideal cozy place.
